data.description: Module to manage a album (collection) of mp3
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module will manage a collection of mp3 files. It will
    "simulate" a music cd with the mp3 files and try to match with a
    cddb database (freedb by default). It will permit to create tags for
    the files in the album and to rename the files according a cddb
    match.
